title: Inventory Service ("Inventony")
summary: Rebuilt an independent Kafka-driven inventory microservice that writes directly to CommerceTools, producing a single source of truth.
details: Built a dedicated inventory service consuming real-time Kafka messages and updating CommerceTools directly. Replaced a brittle chain of Cloud Functions and MongoDB-based syncs. Outcome: zero inventory mismatches during peak events (e.g., Black Friday).

title: Order Service / Event Sequencer
summary: Created a Kafka consumer middleware to sequence order events before applying updates to CommerceTools.
details: Built a middleware Kafka consumer that orders events and applies updates one-at-a-time to avoid concurrent Cloud Function conflicts. This removed Narvar email mismatches and reduced retry-related processing conflicts.

title: Headless Checkout (Bold Commerce)
summary: Integrated Bold Commerce headless checkout (beta) with modular adapters and fallbacks for a mobile-first checkout experience.
details: Integrated Bold Commerce's beta headless checkout in production: worked with Bold engineering, implemented robust error handling, fallback logic, and cross-team testing. Launched with zero downtime and measurable improvements in page speed and cart conversion.

title: GCP Migration & Platform Modernization
summary: Led migration from IBM Cloud to GCP, migrating Cloud Functions and containerized services to GKE and introducing CI/CD.
details: Rewrote legacy IBM Cloud Functions for GCP Cloud Functions, migrated services to GKE, set up GitHub Actions + Cloud Build, and added monitoring/alerts in GCP. Resulted in ~50% fewer deployment incidents and faster rollbacks.

title: Performance & Reliability Fixes
summary: Short-term caching and MongoDB query refactors to reduce DB load and eliminate Kafka offset lag.
details: Implemented server-side caching for styles/brands endpoints to mitigate repetitive FE calls during peak traffic; refactored MongoDB queries (group queries & grouped updates) to eliminate Promise.all per-style queries that caused Kafka offset lag and Cloud Function timeouts.

title: Shopfinalcut Launch
summary: Launched a new outlet store reusing core services with feature flags, shipping, and subtotal/discount adjustments.
details: Added feature flags across data models and services to support a new outlet store; updated checkout integration for same-day shipping and subtotal/discount logic; launched shopfinalcut successfully using the existing backend platform.

title: Jesta → Kafka Reliability Fix
summary: Prevented lost/overwritten messages by adjusting Kafka connect query timing and adding a daily reconciliation job.
details: Extended query intervals and added a secondary daily backfill to ensure long-running Jesta queries don't drop messages. Reduced race conditions and ensured reliable data synchronization.

title: LoginRadius CRM ID Merge
summary: Linked duplicate customer profiles by propagating LoginRadius CRM IDs to Commercetools and merging carts.
details: Integrated LoginRadius CRM ID into the customer flow to detect and merge duplicate profiles created by guest checkout followed by social login, restoring correct customer state and cart continuity.

title: FintelConnect — Affiliate Platform
summary: Frontend lead + full-stack contributor for a real-time affiliate marketing platform adopted by banks and fintechs.
details: Led frontend development of real-time dashboards and performance optimizations; contributed to backend architecture and AWS infra (Lambda, EC2, MongoDB, Auth0). Platform won two FinXTech Awards including Best Solution for Revenue Growth.

title: Bidfy — MVP Delivery
summary: Delivered an MVP (RSS feed + AWS Lambda + DynamoDB) quickly to validate market response in 3 sprints.
details: Built a cost-efficient MVP using serverless components (Lambda, DynamoDB) and an RSS ingestion pipeline to validate product-market fit in a short timeframe.

title: Eventer (Full-Stack)
summary: Group project for an outdoor events management system using Google APIs and Open-Weather API.
details: Responsible for using Google APIs (OAuth, Map and Location) and Open-Weather API on the Activities Page and Admin Page, and image files transformation by Multer.

title: Jungle (E-commerce)
summary: Implemented core e-commerce features including Sold Out badges, Admin Categories, and User Auth.
details: Implemented features of "Product Sold Out - Badge", "Admin Categories", "User Authentication", "Order Details", "E-mail Receipt" and "Product Ratings". Fixed bugs including "Missing Admin Security" and "Checking out with Empty Cart".

title: Charity (IOS Mobile App)
summary: Collaborated on a mental health mobile app offering anxiety treatment plans and mini-games.
details: Collaborated on Clarity, a mental health mobile app that offers personalized anxiety treatment plans, mini-games, data tracking, and a community message board. Designed and implemented the UFO game, an interactive mini-game aimed at reducing anxiety through engaging, fast-paced gameplay.
